features: Unique Color Striped Vase: Add a touch of modern simplicity and cuteness to your home decor with our small flower vase featuring a colorful line design. Its unique shape and cute style make it a perfect addition to your home decor collection.

Perfect Details & Extreme Craftsmanship: Our COTYNI hand-painted colorful vases are meticulously crafted with extraordinary artistic precision. Each product is carefully hand-painted by experienced craftsmen to ensure a refined and polished finish. The line is integrated with the vase body, so you don't have to worry about it falling off.

High Quality Material: Crafted from high quality resin, our small vases are corrosion-resistant, wear-resistant, and durable. Unlike ceramic or glass, resin is less likely to crack or shatter. These vases can also be used to hold water without worrying about water leakage.

Multi-purpose Decorative Vases: This colorful line unique vase is suitable for a variety of settings, including fireplaces, bedrooms, bookshelves, dining tables, and living rooms. It can be perfectly matched with dried flowers, pampas grass, plants, or fresh flowers to add a beautiful artistic landscape to your space. It's also a great gift choice for weddings, birthdays, and housewarmings.

100% After-sales Service: At COTYNI, we pack our products with molded foam and thickened boxes that have passed high-standard quality inspections. As each vase is handcrafted, there may be slight slightly different in product details. If you have any questions or concerns, please email us, and we will reply within 12 hours to provide a satisfactory solution.

We aspire to bring you elegant and mesmerizing pieces that will bring you one step closer to the home of your dreams. You can gift this product to your loved ones and friends who love life, in addition to decorating the bedroom and living room, it will also be a good choice to decorate the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such a cute, very sturdy vase and bigger than what it looked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product is exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Groovy little vase
reviews.reviewText: This is so cute and the quality is amazing. Very sturdy material with a groovy and colorful aesthetic. Absolutely love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a pop of color
reviews.reviewText: Saw this vase in a newsfeed article on re-decorating. It caught my eye so went to Amazon to look at it. thought I would give it a try. It is cute ! Sure to brighten up any spot. Have some yellow artificial flowers in it. It is in my dining area on the buffet server. It is just so different--would not find this in a store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Vase is as pictured and is of great quality. Will not fit a full bouquet of flowers. Flower in picture are Lego’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unique and colorful vase.
reviews.reviewText: This vase by 'COTINY' is very cute and stylish. It's very sturdy, and I love the colorful lines that are on the vase. This vase can go with a variety of different styles and home decor, it definitely adds some fun and color to my home. This vase looks great either by itself, or with flowers/plant. Makes a nice centerpiece alone, or with other decor. It's sturdy, but lightweight. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I think the cost is a little more than what I'd pay for something like this. It's cute and fun, but at its (current) listing of around $22, I wouldn't probably get again unless it was a little cheaper in cost. Other than that, it's a nice product. Fun and unique. And definitely giftable. 😊💖

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vase is exactly as pictured!!
reviews.reviewText: Love this vase! Arrived very well package and secure. It’s more of a plastic-type ceramic material could break but also could be sturdy hard to describe. That said looks exactly like the picture and makes a great centerpiece with fake flowers from Amazon :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Photo
reviews.reviewText: Wife was very pleased with vase. Very pretty and perfect size for her need.
